GSD.description:
extcon: Modify extcon device to be created after driver data is set

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit 6e721f3ad0535b24f19a62420f4da95212cf069c. For more details please see the references link.
